ing: 3/4 cup creamy salad dressing (e.g. Miracle Whip)
des: "This recipe is so simple and tastes just like the 'deli' style. The carrot adds just the right flavor."
ins: Shred imitation crab meat into bite sized pieces. Combine with salad dressing, celery, onions and carrot. Chill for 1 hour before serving.
